prop.name: required
prop.description: Does input required to fill? Also with function type you can pass function with one argument (fn(value){}) and return Boolean value.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value.

note: You can use .fv-input class to custom element and set .placeholder class to child element for placeholder style.
This component wrapped to normal html input element, so custom events and attributes are available on this.
